channel.title: A-Town FM
channel.description: From the land of Arnold, Missouri where the only skyscraper we need is a water tower, comes an entertainment podcast where two bold Midwesterners record a stream of consciousness touching on everything from movies, comics, to politics. Be enlightened! Website: atownfm.com Twitter: @atownfm Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/atownfm Tags: atownfm
channel.itunes:subtitle: Two Dudes From Arnold

item.title: 31: Offending Europe Part 2, TV remakes, Oscars Preshow
item.dc:creator: atownfm
item.description:
This week we kick things off with a bunch of tangents, one time I was going to the store and got in the line that said “10 items or less” and counted the guy in front of me who clearly had 12 items. Do yogurts count as individual items or is that considered…like…one product. Anyway back to the description…. we then head on to the the Great Movie Pass Dilemma, discuss some TV remakes and whether they’ll doom us all, and end talking a bit about the announced Oscar nominations.

A-Town FM Oscars Ballot 2018

Show Notes:

Norway Episode

Swedish Book Dan Was Talking About (The Quantum Thief)

Dropbox doesn’ [...]
item.content:encoded:
This week we kick things off with a bunch of tangents, one time I was going to the store and got in the line that said “10 items or less” and counted the guy in front of me who clearly had 12 items. Do yogurts count as individual items or is that considered...like...one product. Anyway back to the description.... we then head on to the the Great Movie Pass Dilemma, discuss some TV remakes and whether they’ll doom us all, and end talking a bit about the announced Oscar nominations.

A-Town FM Oscars Ballot 2018

Show Notes:

Norway Episode

Swedish Book Dan Was Talking About (The Quantum Thief)

Dropbox doesn't use Amazon Web Services

Amazon Go Store

Amazon Go Shoplifting

Movie Pass Film Distributor?

Movie Pass vs AMC

Oscar Nominees 2018

D3: The Mighty Ducks (not starring Mark Wahlberg)

Puppies!

item.title: 27: Star Wars: The Last Jedi
item.dc:creator: atownfm
item.description:
Star Wars: The Last Jedi has released! After two years of waiting and theorizing the galaxy has finally delivered the next chapter in the ongoing saga. 

Does the film live up to expectations? Does the audience finally get answers to burning questions? How have audiences reacted to the movie? What new questions have arisen?

In a galaxy filled with turmoil two brave adepts are sent into their local theaters to confront the new film and dissect it for your pleasure…

Show Notes
item.content:encoded:
Star Wars: The Last Jedi has released! After two years of waiting and theorizing the galaxy has finally delivered the next chapter in the ongoing saga. 
Does the film live up to expectations? Does the audience finally get answers to burning questions? How have audiences reacted to the movie? What new questions have arisen?
In a galaxy filled with turmoil two brave adepts are sent into their local theaters to confront the new film and dissect it for your pleasure...

Show Notes

item.title: 21: Offending Europe, Instagram Sucks Part 2, Disney Takeover, Streaming Services, Dan’s Weird Experience
item.dc:creator: atownfm
item.description:
This week we single handedly offend all of Europe in our follow up, discuss for the thousandth time why instagram is awful for business, Disney is taking over 21st Century Fox and your soul, and Dan has a weird experience.

Show Notes

Website: atownfm.com

Twitter: @atownfm

item.title: 14: Instagram Sucks, Parking Ticket Protest, Marketing Lab, Podcast Envy, Not as Advertised
item.dc:creator: atownfm
item.description:
This week our two farmhand hosts get swept into an enchanted world where magic and topics lurk around every corner. After a pack of wild beasts sent by the Dark One murders their families they set off on a quest where they face five tasks: Instagram, parking tickets, Dan’s marketing lab, podcast envy, and finally products that aren’t quite as advertised.

Once the princess is rescued they turn to go home.

BUT WAIT!

What is this?!

And lo, from the pits of darkness, a dedicated husk of a monster upheaves itself from the depths. His decrepit body sends a wail that strikes fear in the hearts of men and wakes babes lying in their cribs. Behold! The monster wakes. Behold! The destroyer of all that is right! And on his forehead there stands a single word like a profane jape of all that humanity holds dear: “NOAH”< [...]
item.content:encoded:
This week our two farmhand hosts get swept into an enchanted world where magic and topics lurk around every corner. After a pack of wild beasts sent by the Dark One murders their families they set off on a quest where they face five tasks: Instagram, parking tickets, Dan's marketing lab, podcast envy, and finally products that aren’t quite as advertised.

Once the princess is rescued they turn to go home.

BUT WAIT!

What is this?!

And lo, from the pits of darkness, a dedicated husk of a monster upheaves itself from the depths. His decrepit body sends a wail that strikes fear in the hearts of men and wakes babes lying in their cribs. Behold! The monster wakes. Behold! The destroyer of all that is right! And on his forehead there stands a single word like a profane jape of all that humanity holds dear: “NOAH”

Can they defeat Noah, release the lands of his curse, and restore the world to what it once was? Listen and find out!

Show Notes:

Most Popular Social Networks In the US

Two Bit Geeks

Infinity Stones

Crong Plush Poro Poro

Website: atownfm.com

Twitter: @atownfm

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/atownfm
item.itunes:subtitle: This week our two farmhand hosts get swept into an enchanted world where magic and topics lurk around every corner. After a pack of wild ...
item.itunes:summary:
This week our two farmhand hosts get swept into an enchanted world where magic and topics lurk around every corner. After a pack of wild beasts sent by the Dark One murders their families they set off on a quest where they face five tasks: Instagram, parking tickets, Dan's marketing lab, podcast envy, and finally products that aren’t quite as advertised.



Once the princess is rescued they turn to go home.



BUT WAIT!



What is this?!



And lo, from the pits of darkness, a dedicated husk of a monster upheaves itself from the depths. His decrepit body sends a wail that strikes fear in the hearts of men and wakes babes lying in their cribs. Behold! The monster wakes. Behold! The destroyer of all that is right! And on his forehead there stands a single word like a profane jape of all that humanity holds dear: “NOAH”



Can they defeat Noah, release the lands of his curse, and restore the world to what it once was? Listen and find out!



Show Notes:


Most Popular Social Networks In the US


Two Bit Geeks


Infinity Stones


Crong Plush Poro Poro

item.itunes:author: Dan, Charlie

item.title: 1: Spider-Man Posters, How To News, Andy Serkis
item.dc:creator: atownfm
item.description:
On this weeks episode our two intrepid hosts, Charlie and Dan, discuss a variety of topics ranging from the ridiculous posters for the new Spider-Man film, how we consume news in an age of heightened cynicism and social media, and whether or not Andy Serkis deserves an award for the many CGI characters he’s played in film.

Show Notes

Website: atownfm.com

Twitter: @atownfm

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/atownfm
